elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Which of the following statements are true and which are false? If the statements are false, correct them.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Developing proposals: If a company draws up a proposal for potential customers, it does not necessarily have to ensure that it con-siders all of the customer's needs and requirements.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Correction:
elements.correctAnswer: Developing proposals: If a company draws up a proposal for potential customers, it has to ensure that it considers all of the customer's needs and requirements.

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Which of the following statements are true and which are false? If the statements are false, correct them.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Conversation: Effective conversational techniques must be learned and, above all, regularly applied.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Which of the following statements are true and which are false? If the statements are false, correct them.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: First and foremost, it is important to understand the needs and their interre-lationships. This aspect is part of the topic "Clarify budget and time frame"

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Correction:
elements.correctAnswer: This aspect is part of the preliminary conversation, in other words the initial contact.

elements.name: panel3
elements.title: Which of the following statements are true and which are false? If the statements are false, correct them.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: The identification of current challenges is not central to the needs assessment and should be left to the customer.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Correction:
elements.correctAnswer: Focusing on concrete difficulties which could impair the normal course of business is central to the needs assessment. Challenges should be documented in detail in order to create a clear foundation for possible solutions.
